original_text: And when they had made an end of offering, the king and all that were present with him bowed themselves, and worshipped.
korean_text: 제사 드리기를 마치매 왕과 그와 함께 있는 자들이 다 엎드려 경배하니라

sentences.original_text: And when they had made an end of offering,
the king and all that were present with him
sentences.korean_translation: 왕과 그와 함께 있던 모든 사람들이
